name: RemOOve 2
description:
RemOOve 2 is a puzzle game in which a player needs to remove objects from their original positions and move them in a way they collect all the stars in every level. But there's a catch - once you pick up an object, you need to move it constantly because if you stop the object will drop and fall and therefore your level progress will be lost.

There are also some special areas in the game:

RED AREA - red area is a killer area and your level is lost automatically if you move an object here
BLUE AREA - blue areas are no-play areas, meaning that you can not move objects onto them
PINK AREA - pink areas are areas of low gravity

Plan your moves, keep your head clear and collect all the stars to create your goals and reach them.
